title: Preparations Are Steadily Underway!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey, hey, I heard µ’s is going to use helicopters for the next live concert......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, Nico must have been talking about it. She said we’d be descending from helicopters onto the stage, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Rin-chan said she wants to parachute onto the stage.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Awesome~! That’s a nice idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>We’ll need to use four helicopters for that......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That sounds super, super exciting~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I know, right!? It’s gonna be so much fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Oh, is Nico going to parachute too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>No, she said she’s okay! I definitely want to do that, though. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
